title: Investigate Inventory Discrepancy
description: A picker reports a short pick because an item was not in its primary location. An inventory controller must investigate why.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the short-pick alert and identify the item and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the item and location with the discrepancy.

tasks.description: Review the transaction history for the item, looking for recent movements, receipts, or adjustments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the logs to find clues for the missing item.

tasks.description: Check if the item exists in any other locations in the warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the 'missing' stock was put away in an incorrect location.

tasks.description: Create a task for an operator to move the item to its correct location and perform an inventory adjustment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates tasks to correct both the physical location and the system record.
